mods.accessCondition: This audio file is the property of the Country Music Hall of Fame® and Museum and may be protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. The file may not be downloaded, reproduced, or distributed without permission. End users must obtain all required permissions or consents from the owners of such rights. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this, contact audio@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite audio file information in email.
mods.abstract: Multiple recordings of artist excerpts from Biff Collie's (entertainer) Music City Album Review. Recordings include excerpts from Lionel Cartwright (performer), Don Williams (performer), Holly Dunn (performer), T. G. Brown (performer), Cee Cee Chapman (performer), the Forester Sisters (performance group), the Desert Rose Band (performance group), Earl Thomas Conley (performer), Clint Black (performer), Kathy Mattea (performer), Patty Loveless (performer), Lacy J. Dalton (performer), Johnny Rodriquez (performer), Vern Gosdin (performer), Eddy Raven (performer), Billy Joe Royal (performer), Foster & Lloyd (performance group), John Conlee (performer), Mickey Gilley (performer), Restless Heart (performance group), Jo-El Sonnier (performer), Ronnie McDowell (performer), Mel McDaniel (performer), Moe Bandy (performer), Skip Ewing (performer), Dan Seals (performer), Larry Gatlin (performer), Baillie and the Boys (performance group), Suzy Bogguss (performer), Shenandoah (performer), Garth Brooks (performer), Tanya Tucker (performer), and the Burch Sisters (performance group).

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS v3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America.
